TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit PublisherIdentityPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission
Public NotInheritable Class PublisherIdentityPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission
public ref class PublisherIdentityPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission

summary.span: Represents the identity of a software publisher.

span.span: Represents the identity of a software publisher.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，不會使用身分識別的權限。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], identity permissions are not used. > > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，身分識別的權限不能有的使用權限狀態值。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, identity permissions cannot have an permission state value. 從.NET Framework 2.0 版開始，身分識別的權限可以有任何權限狀態的值。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, identity permissions can have any permission state value. 這表示在 2.0 和更新版本的版本中，身分識別的權限具有相同的行為，做為實作的權限介面。This means that in 2.0 and later versions, identity permissions have the same behavior as permissions that implement the interface. 也就是身分識別的要求一定成功，不論身分識別的組件中，如果組件授與完全信任。That is, a demand for an identity always succeeds, regardless of the identity of the assembly, if the assembly has been granted full trust. > > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，身分識別的權限的要求是有效的即使在呼叫組件是完全受信任。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective, even when the calling assembly is fully trusted. 也就是說，雖然呼叫組件具有完全信任，但是，如果組件不符合要求的準則識別權限的要求即會失敗。That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria. 從.NET Framework 2.0 版開始，身分識別的權限的要求是沒有效果，如果呼叫的組件具有完全信任。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust. 如此可確保所有的權限，不會將身分識別的權限的特殊案例的一致性。This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case. > [!NOTE] > 根據預設，程式碼存取安全性不會檢查辨識項。By default, code access security does not check for evidence. 除非您的電腦有基礎的自訂程式碼群組類別，可以改善效能，藉由略過 Authenticode 簽章驗證。Unless your computer has a custom code group based on the class, you can improve performance by bypassing Authenticode signature verification. 這可以藉由設定執行階段提供程式碼存取安全性的辨識項。This is accomplished by configuring the runtime to not provide evidence for code access security. 如需有關如何設定這個選項和其應用程式可以使用它，查看項目。For more information about how to configure this option and which applications can use it, see the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立的 Authenticode 碼簽署的 X.509 憑證會定義指定的軟體發行者的身分識別。The X.509 certificate defines the identity of the specified software publisher, as established by Authenticode code signing.

span.span: The parameter is not a valid certificate.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會建立完全限制 (`None`) 或`Unrestricted`權限。Creates either a fully restricted (`None`) or `Unrestricted` permission. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，身分識別的權限不能有的使用權限狀態值。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, identity permissions cannot have an permission state value. 從.NET Framework 2.0 版開始，身分識別的權限可以有任何權限狀態的值。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, identity permissions can have any permission state value. 這表示在 2.0 和更新版本的版本中，身分識別的權限具有相同的行為，做為實作的權限介面。This means that in 2.0 and later versions, identity permissions have the same behavior as permissions that implement the interface. 也就是身分識別的要求一定成功，不論身分識別的組件中，如果組件授與完全信任。That is, a demand for an identity always succeeds, regardless of the identity of the assembly, if the assembly has been granted full trust. 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，身分識別的權限的要求是有效的即使在呼叫組件是完全受信任。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective, even when the calling assembly is fully trusted. 也就是說，雖然呼叫組件具有完全信任，但是，如果組件不符合要求的準則識別權限的要求即會失敗。That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria. 從.NET Framework 2.0 版開始，身分識別的權限的要求是沒有效果，如果呼叫的組件具有完全信任。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust. 如此可確保所有的權限，不會將身分識別的權限的特殊案例的一致性。This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用這個 建構函式。The following example shows how to use the constructor. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermission#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermission/CPP/publisheridentitypermission.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermission#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermission/CS/publisheridentitypermission.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermission#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.PublisherIdentityPermission/VB/publisheridentitypermission.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個權限的交集會說明兩者所共同描述的作業集合的權限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 只有通過這兩個原始的使用權限的需求將會通過交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection. 只支援設定作業 (， ，和) 當目前的權限等於所指定權限。 only supports set operations (, , and ) when the current permission is equal to the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的使用權限是指定的權限的子集，兩個權限是否相等。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the two permissions are equal. 如果此方法傳回`true`，目前的使用權限與指定權限受保護的資源表示相同的存取權。If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents the same access to the protected resource as the specified permission. 支援設定作業 (， ，和) 只有當目前的權限等於所指定權限。 supports set operations (, , and ) only when the current permission is equal to the specified permission.

summary.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要呼叫的結果方法是代表的權限表示的所有作業的目前權限和指定的權限。The result of a call to the method is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. 任何通過其中之一權限的需求會傳遞它們的聯集。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union. 類別僅支援設定作業 (， ，和) 當目前的權限等於所指定權限。The class only supports set operations (, , and ) when the current permission is equal to the specified permission.
